description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Pedro is a trick taking card game that is played around the world with various rules.  The game is played by two teams of two players. The object of the game is to win a predetermined number of points through a series of hands. Incorporating elements of other team games like Bridge and Spades, Pedro is a fun, fast-paced game everyone can enjoy.
